name: SMASHED (JamesConwayArt)
description:
SMASHED is a game created by five Staffordshire Uni students for a masters collaborative module.

The player will fight imaginary monsters while under the influence of alcohol. The player can earn coins by defeating the beings and can buy more drinks with that money.

The Team

Alessandra Garber - Design/Tech

Huw Weaver - Tech

Ethan Holmes - Environment/UI design

Igraine Caldow - Character Artist

James Conway - Hard Surface/Prop artist
